RULE_FOOD_001.title: Forbidden Food or Enhancement
RULE_FOOD_001.description: The player has consumed food or enhancement items, which are not allowed during the competition.

RULE_MOUNT_002.title: Mount Usage
RULE_MOUNT_002.description: The player used a mount, which is explicitly forbidden by the event rules.

RULE_GROUP_003.title: Party or Squad Participation
RULE_GROUP_003.description: The player joined or interacted with a party or squad, violating the solo play requirement.

RULE_HEAL_004.title: Healing Skill Usage
RULE_HEAL_004.description: The player used or equipped healing skills, which are not allowed during the competition.

RULE_BUFF_005.title: Experience Boost Detected
RULE_BUFF_005.description: An experience booster or related effect was detected on the character.

RULE_GEAR_006.title: Invalid Equipment
RULE_GEAR_006.description: The player equipped armor or accessories that are not permitted under competition rules.

RULE_MISC_999.title: Unspecified Violation
RULE_MISC_999.description: A rule violation was detected but could not be specifically categorized.
